title: Watch, Athletics World C’ships: The Indian men’s 4x400m relay team set a new Asian record in heats
content: Athletics World C’ships 2023: India set new Asian record to reach men’s 4x400m relay finalThe Indian 4x400m Relay Team breaks the Asian Record at #WACBudapest23 with a timing of 2:59.05s and qualifies for the final. ⚡️📹: @JioCinema #Budapest23 #CraftingVictories 🇮🇳 pic.twitter.com/WleJo73vdt— Inspire Institute of Sport (@IIS_Vijayanagar) August 26, 2023
author: Scroll Staff
